```{r}
scrabble <- read_csv("https://dcgerard.github.io/stat_412_612/data/words.txt")
```

```{r}


str_count(scrabble) #Count how many strings in vector


```

2. How many words either begin or end in “X”?

```{r}
scrabble %>% 
  str_extract_all("^X", "9999")
  filter(str_extract_all("9999"))
```

3. How many words contain all of the vowels (A, E, I, O, and U)?

```{r}
str_replace_all(scrabble, "(?i)[aeiou]")
```
